thread.title: Matthew Ferren
thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by Matthew Ferren

author: Matthew Ferren
title: Matthew Ferren
text: Amanda answered all of our questions and hooked us up with a wonderful package. She was very professional AND very personable. She was always available to answer any questions we had and did everything she could to help keep our honeymoon within our desired budget.
